localization.MOUSETOUR.Title: Welcome to Mouseguard
localization.MOUSETOUR.Description: Welcome to Mouseguard! This Tour will give you a brief overview of the roll mechanics.
localization.MOUSETOUR.WelcomeContent: This tour will explain the basic functionality of the mouseguard roll system.
localization.MOUSETOUR.TrayContent: The roll tray will show you how many dice are currently in your dicepool.
localization.MOUSETOUR.TrayAddDice: To add dice to the pool click the +1 Dice button, to remove dice click -1 Dice button
localization.MOUSETOUR.TrayRollDice: Clicking Roll dice will roll the dice.  If you're using the Dice So Nice, 3d dice with custom faces will roll.
